definitions.title: l.
definitions.body: great, lit., of image Da 2:31, rock v:Da 2:35, city Da 4:27, sea Da 7:2, beast v:Da 7:3, v:Da 7:17, teeth v:Da 7:7, gifts Da 2:48; great, imposing, feast Da 5:1, signs 3:33, words Da 7:8, Da 7:11, Da 7:20; c. [[מִן]] comp. Da 7:20.
fig. of power, influence, etc.: great king Da 2:10, Ezr 4:10, Ezr 5:11 (cf. Zinj. [[מלכן רברבן]] Cooke:183), God Ezr 5:8, Da 2:45.
